entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Edmonton (Int'l Aprt)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:26 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -25.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Edmonton Int'l Airport 06:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -25.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 104.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -33
Dewpoint: -29.4°C
Wind: SE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
